title: Screaming Into The Void
description: Turn on the news or look at Twitter, and it's likely you'll be bombarded by outrage. Many people have come to believe that the only way to spark change is to incite anger. This week on Hidden Brain, how outrage is hijacking our conversations, our communities, and our minds.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
